task.summary: - Added support for Bootstrap - Added a main page (HomePage.html) - updated gradle build file to add support for MySql driver - Initialized connection to MySql Server - Added other support files
- Added support for Bootstrap - Added a main page (HomePage.html) - updated gradle build file to add support for MySql driver - Initialized connection to MySql Server - Added other support files

Revert "- Added support for Bootstrap - Added a main page (HomePage.html) - updated gradle build file to add support for MySql driver - Initialized connection to MySql Server - Added other support files"
This reverts commit ca075b1

Added a new page - Detail.html
- Also handled request/responses for the detail page. - List.html populates all the customers from the database. - Details shows information of the selected customers.

Added a ItemDetail page
- Retrieves item details utilizing a REST service
